DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of prolonged effort in long distance running on the biomechanical bilateral asymmetry in the lower limbs of trans tibial amputee running with running specific prosthesis.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Trans Tibial Amputee Running Asymmetry During Prolonged Effort
DOC.criteria: Unilateral traumatic trans tibial amputee. Experience in running with running specific prosthesis. Ability to run for at least 20 minutes. Injury or other orthopedic or neurologic issue that compromises the gait.
